public final class WindowsGPIBDriver
extends java.lang.Object

Jean-Michel DRICOT extended by Ralf Tralow

Method Detail

initialize

public boolean initialize(boolean getIDN)
Description copied from interface: GPIBDriver
initialize() will be called by the GPIBDeviceIdentifier's static initializer. The responsibility of this method is: 1) Ensure that the hardware is present. 2) Load any required native libraries. 3) Register the port names with the CommPortIdentifier.

Specified by:
initialize in interface GPIBDriver
Parameters:
getIDN - false=no *IDN? send to found devices, true=try to get IDN from devices
Returns:
true, if successful

getDevice

public GPIBDevice getDevice(int address)
Description copied from interface: GPIBDriver
returns a GPIB device using its GPIB address. See IEEE488 and IEEE488.2 specifications

Specified by:
getDevice in interface GPIBDriver
Parameters:
address - the GPIB address (from 0 to 31)
Returns:
the device
